title: Nouakchott
summary: Nouakchott (/nwækˈʃɒt, nwɑː-/; French: [nwakʃɔt]; Arabic: نواكشوط‎; Berber: Nwakcoṭ, originally derived from Berber: Nawākšūṭ, "place of the winds")[2] is the capital and largest city of Mauritania. It is one of the largest cities in the Sahel.[3] The city also serves as the administrative and economic center of Mauritania.
